summary: * aspell: hacked up a little patch to allow additional dictionary   directories to be specified through the environment variable   ASPELL_EXTRA_DICT_DIRS.  This way dictionaries don't have to be   installed into aspell's prefix.  Instead you can just set   ASPELL_EXTRA_DICT_DIRS to $HOME/.nix-profile/lib/aspell and install   dictionaries separately with nix-env (e.g. "nix-env -i   aspell-dict-nl").
